desc.zh-CN: 成都地铁在近期更新了他们的地铁线路网图，更改了部分站点的英文名以及添加上了8号线2期与19号线2期，故重绘并上传。
desc.en: Chengdu Metro has recently updated their metro network diagram, changed the English names of some stations, and added Line 8 Phase 2 and Line 19 Phase 2, so redrawn and uploaded.

updateHistory.reason: Add Chengdu Metro Template With Tram
Add Futian Station with effect from 13 August 2023.
Chengdu Metro has recently updated their metro network diagram
